title: Police say Liverpool bomber acted alone, bought parts over 7 months
content:
1. Police say Liverpool bomber acted alone, bought parts over 7 months  New York Post
  2. Liverpool Bomber Had Planned for Months, U.K. Police Say  The New York Times
  3. Poppy Day Bombing: Liverpool attack suspect details emerge  Channel 4 News
  4. Police say Liverpool attacker bought bomb parts for 6 months  Associated Press

localize.title: リバプールの爆弾犯は単独犯で、7ヶ月間にわたって部品を購入していたと警察は発表しました。
警方称利物浦炸弹袭击者单独行动，购买零件超过7个月
警方稱利物浦炸彈襲擊者單獨行動，購買零件超過7個月
